content: pattern formerly available at aol hometown http //members aol com/maglizrd/private/crochet/crochetteddybears html http //members aol com/maglizrd/private/crochet/crochetteddybears html pattern includes instructions for a bunny and teddy bear **materials** - small amount any weight yarn a second and third color for the inner ear and muzzle/tail if desired on the bunnies - small amount stuffing - crochet hook - tapestry needle - embroidery floss or thread for mouth and nose - 2 small beads for eyes these could be embroidered also or wiggle eyes can be used
